name: location
title: Location
description: Location descriptor as reported in the original source.

name: iso_3166
title: ISO-3166
description: ISO-3166 codes for locations corresponding to countries.

name: iso_3166_2
title: ISO-3166-2
description: ISO-3166-2 codes for locations corresponding to sub-national jurisdictions.

name: period_start_date
title: Period Start Date
description: Start date of time interval for which a count was reported, in ISO-8601 format (i.e. YYYY-MM-DD).

name: period_end_date
title: Period End Date
description: End date of time interval for which a count was reported, in ISO-8601 format (i.e. YYYY-MM-DD).

name: disease_family
title: Disease Family
description: Disease family as reported by the original source.

name: disease
title: Disease
description: Disease name as reported by the original source.

name: icd_9
title: ICD 9 Code
description: Disease codes for version 9 of the International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, published by the World Health Organization.

name: icd_7
title: ICD 7 Code
description: Disease codes for version 7 of the International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, published by the World Health Organization.

name: disease_subclass
title: Disease Subclass
description: Disease subclass as reported by the original source -- cf. Disease

name: icd_9_subclass
title: ICD 9 Code for Disease Subclass
description: Disease codes associated with a subclass identified by the original source. Codes are for version 9 of the International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, published by the World Health Organization.

name: icd_7_subclass
title: ICD 7 Code for Disease Subclass
description: Disease codes associated with a subclass identified by the original source. Codes are for version 7 of the International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, published by the World Health Organization.

name: lower_age
title: Lower Age Bound
description: Lower age bound in years of all individuals associated with a particular record.

name: upper_age
title: Upper Age Bound
description: Upper age bound in years of all individuals associated with a particular record.

name: sex
title: Sex
description: Sex of all individuals associated with a particular record as reported by the original source.

name: cases_this_period
title: Case Numbers Reported for this Period
description: Number of cases reported for this period, at the end of this period -- as reported by the original source. Includes different types of missing values as reported by the original source. Type "string" allows different types of missing values to be specified as reported by the original source and allows users to choose which type of missing values to work with.

name: cases_prev_period
title: Case Numbers Reported for the Previous Period
description: Number of cases reported for the previous period, at the end of this current period -- as reported by the original source. Includes different types of missing values as reported by the original source. Type "string" allows different types of missing values to be specified as reported by the original source and allows users to choose which type of missing values to work with.

name: cases_cum_report_year
title: Cumulative Case Numbers for the Report Year
description: Total number of cases up until this current period, in the current year -- as reported by the original source. Includes different types of missing values as reported by the original source. Type "string" allows different types of missing values to be specified as reported by the original source and allows users to choose which type of missing values to work with.

name: cases_cum_prev_year
title: Cumulative Case Numbers for the Previous Year
description: Total number of cases up until this current period, in the previous year -- as reported by the original source. Includes different types of missing values as reported by the original source. Type "string" allows different types of missing values to be specified as reported by the original source and allows users to choose which type of missing values to work with.

name: cases_median_prev_5_years
title: Median Weekly Case Numbers Over the Previous Five Years
description: Median number of weekly cases in this current period, with the median taken over the previous five years -- as reported by the original source. Includes different types of missing values as reported by the original source. Type "string" allows different types of missing values to be specified as reported by the original source and allows users to choose which type of missing values to work with.

name: cases_cum_median_prev_5_years
title: Median Cumulative Case Numbers Over the Previous Five Years
description: Median number of cumulative cases by this current period, with the median taken over the previous five years -- as reported by the original source. Includes different types of missing values as reported by the original source. Type "string" allows different types of missing values to be specified as reported by the original source and allows users to choose which type of missing values to work with.

name: population
title: Population
description: Estimated total number of individuals associated with a particular record.

name: cause
title: Cause
description: Cause of mortality as reported by the original source.

name: location_scale
title: Location Scale
description: Location of recorded data (prov, can) for a given case count

name: time_scale
title: Time Scale
description: Time scale of recorded data (wk, mt, qrtr, yr) for a given case count
